name: Break The Logs (sfbll)
description:
This game is harder than climbing EVEREST! Don't you believe? Then download the game and start playing! First chapters are exercise phases. You will then see the real challenge. Sometimes you'll have to deal with milliseconds to throw the ax at the right time. Start to play with different backgrounds, different mechanics and different camera angles.

There are 100 level for you!
Deal with the challenge of freezing time at the right time, or passing the portal at the right time! Sometimes not hitting the wood can turn your ax!  

Sometimes some easter eggs waiting you!

Break the logs in everywhere! Inside of the colors, under the sea, above the clouds, deep inside of the space and so many more!
